column1: Common Bond Bistro & Bakery - Montrose////It was better a few years ago. Seems like they have sold out with the screen menus
column3: and there just seems to be something missing with the food as well. I can almost sense the lack of care that it once had. Two years ago
column4: this would have been easily five stars. Now
column5: just expect an average coffee shop and bakery if you go here.
